waterLevel.mainContent:
• Ref Value #1 & 2: The depths in 'mm' manually marked on the sensor cable as reference points. Limits = 100 to 5000.
  • Logger Reading #1 & 2: The value shown on the view tab of the Xtract app when the sensor is submerged to each ref value depth. Limits = 1000.0 to 6553.5 or 10000 to 65535.
  • Temperature: The temperature value shown on the view tab of the Xtract app during calibration. Limits = 0.00 to 99.99.
  • Sensor Length: The specified length of the the sensor cable (not including the logger) as shown on the label. IMPORTANT! Changing the sensor length requires a re-calibration of the logger.
